name: Space (itch)
description:
Space: Game Template for Stencyl - Starter Kit Shoot 'em up

by Gurigraphics

Create your own game with this Template.

Game Template for Stencyl - Starter Kit Shoot 'em up

You may use these template in personal and commercial game projects.

Included
  • Stencyl Project (Size 1.808 KB)
  • Sound pack (8 files - MP3 and OGG)
  • Space Art Pack by Kenney (20 sprites)

No attribution required. If you want to credit me anyway,
credit me as "Gurigraphics" (https://gurigraphics.itch.io)

Download:

https://gurigraphics.itch.io/template-space
